Hi all -- quick announcement that I've put up an RFC regarding our plan for debugging in Wasmtime: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/rfcs/pull/44

tl;dr is that I'm planning to start work on debugging support soon, and have had some Thoughts about a better way to go about this than our "debugging v1" RFC from early 2024. The surface experience or overall goals don't change at all -- this is about compiler and runtime-level implementation strategy, but certain details were fixed in the original RFC so we need a new one to update them. Interested to hear your feedback!

RFC: new approach to debugging in Wasmtime by cfallin 路 Pull Request #44 路 bytecodealliance/rfcs
